title: PrecisionRecallCurve
description: Describes serialized precision recall curve in json format.

type.description: Constant value that provides an indicator on how to interpret this data.

precision.description: Precision values such that element i is the precision of predictions with score >= thresholds[i] and the last element is 1.

recall.description: Decreasing recall values such that element i is the recall of predictions with score >= thresholds[i] and the last element is 0.

averagePrecisionScore.description: AP summarizes a precision-recall curve as the weighted mean of precisions achieved at each threshold, with the increase in recall from the previous threshold used as the weight.

noSkill.description: The precision threshold under which the classifier cannot discriminate between the classes and would predict a random class or a constant class in all cases.
